name: open-annex-iv
description: Open-source AIFMD Annex IV XML serialization library. Converts plain report objects to ESMA-compliant XML.

scripts.test: node --loader ts-node/esm tests/serializer.test.ts && node --loader ts-node/esm tests/helpers.test.ts && node --loader ts-node/esm tests/edge-cases.test.ts

author: Caelith Technologies (https://caelith.tech)
